desc: Drink up and pucker up! Cherry Lane Concentrated Tart Cherry Juice is sourly delicious. Tart cherry juice concentrates have been studied as treatments for migraines, joint pain, insomnia and inflammation

layout.text: You’re sweet enough already. It’s time to pucker up when you drink up.
Cherry Lane’s Concentrated Tart Cherry Juice will make your lips pucker with that sour sensation we all know and love. There’s no better way to start the day than with a kiss-ready, ruby red pucker.
